description: Stack-based buffer overflow in IBM Informix Dynamic Server (IDS) 7.x through 7.31, 9.x through 9.40, 10.00 before 10.00.xC10, 11.10 before 11.10.xC3, and 11.50 before 11.50.xC3 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via long DBINFO keyword arguments in a SQL statement, aka idsdb00165017, idsdb00165019, idsdb00165021, idsdb00165022, and idsdb00165023.
